rect.style: overflow: visible; marker: none; opacity: 1; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgb(222, 255, 228); fill-opacity: 0.338028; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: none; stroke-width: 3.4; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1; visibility: visible; display: inline;
